00011 
00012 //  Metrowerks C++ compiler setup:
00013 
00014 // locale support is disabled when linking with the dynamic runtime
00015 #   ifdef _MSL_NO_LOCALE
00016 #     define BOOST_NO_STD_LOCALE
00017 #   endif 
00018 
00019 #   if __MWERKS__ <= 0x2301  // 5.3
00020 #     define BOOST_NO_FUNCTION_TEMPLATE_ORDERING
00021 #     define BOOST_NO_POINTER_TO_MEMBER_CONST
00022 #     define BOOST_NO_DEPENDENT_TYPES_IN_TEMPLATE_VALUE_PARAMETERS
00023 #     define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_KEYWORD
00024 #   endif
00025 
00026 #   if __MWERKS__ <= 0x2401  // 6.2
00027 //#     define BOOST_NO_FUNCTION_TEMPLATE_ORDERING
00028 #   endif
00029 
00030 #   if(__MWERKS__ <= 0x2407)  // 7.x
00031 #     define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_FUNCTION_SPECIALIZATIONS
00032 #     define BOOST_NO_UNREACHABLE_RETURN_DETECTION
00033 #   endif
00034 
00035 #   if(__MWERKS__ <= 0x3003)  // 8.x
00036 #     define BOOST_NO_SFINAE
00037 #    endif
00038 
00039 #   if(__MWERKS__ <= 0x3202)  // 9.2
00040 #     define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00041 #    endif
00042 
00043 #if !__option(wchar_type)
00044 #   define BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_WCHAR_T
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #if !__option(exceptions)
00048 #   define BOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 #if (__INTEL__ && _WIN32) || (__POWERPC__ && macintosh)
00052 #   if __MWERKS__ == 0x3000
00053 #     define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 8.0
00054 #   elif __MWERKS__ == 0x3001
00055 #     define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 8.1
00056 #   elif __MWERKS__ == 0x3002
00057 #     define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 8.2
00058 #   elif __MWERKS__ == 0x3003
00059 #     define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 8.3
00060 #   elif __MWERKS__ == 0x3200
00061 #     define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 9.0
00062 #   elif __MWERKS__ == 0x3201
00063 #     define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 9.1
00064 #   elif __MWERKS__ == 0x3202
00065 #     define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION 9.2
00066 #   else
00067 #     define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION __MWERKS__
00068 #   endif
00069 #else
00070 #  define BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION __MWERKS__
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 #define BOOST_COMPILER "Metrowerks CodeWarrior C++ version " BOOST_STRINGIZE(BOOST_COMPILER_VERSION)
00074 
00075 //
00076 // versions check:
00077 // we don't support Metrowerks prior to version 5.3:
00078 #if __MWERKS__ < 0x2301
00079 #  error "Compiler not supported or configured - please reconfigure"
00080 #endif
00081 //
00082 // last known and checked version:
00083 #if (__MWERKS__ > 0x3202)
00084 #  if defined(BOOST_ASSERT_CONFIG)
00085 #     error "Unknown compiler version - please run the configure tests and report the results"
00086 #  endif
00087 #endif
